page.title: 03GRAFFITI IN EAST SWINDON
page.content: {Graffiti}is when people spray or draw on walls where other people don't want it.In this area there is a lot of graffiti in the subways.Kids make the walls colourful with bright coloured pens and spray cans.This graffiti makes the place look like its's got a bit of life.Sometimes it is spoiled by kids scribbling on it.Most of the walls have bad words or drawings on them. There is some graffiti on the bike sheds. {Vandalism}is when people break things on purpose and for the fun of it.These people cause upset and shame to the town and people living in it.People who do graffiti or vandalism should be put in prison.
